mapper.select: select sid, sname, tid, city, area, tel, date_format(regDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') regDate, status from shopinfo order by sid limit #{page}, #{rows}
mapper.update: update shopinfo set tel=#{tel}, startHours=#{startHours}, endHours=#{endHours}, status=#{status} where sid=#{sid}
mapper.select: select sid, sname from shopinfo where status !=0
select sid, sname, tid, province, city, area, addr, intro, pics, tel, license, date_format(regDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') regDate, startHours, endHours, status from shopinfo where sid=#{_parameter}
